Job Description:
1–3 years of experience as an Account Executive, preferably from Online Media/know basic programmatic
Experience in seek new prospective clients
Have good networking track with direct client/advertising agency is a plus
Have great communication, interpersonal & presentation skills
Understand the newest advertising industry, digital programmatic ads & digital media trends
Candidates with knowledge or experience in programmatic ads and programmatic sales are preferred.

Requirements
• Minimum 2 years in a supervisory or team lead role.
• Must have experience in programmatic advertising
• Must have experience ad networks
• Must have experience in digital media selling, and media publisher operations.
• Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field.
• Minimum 4–5 years of experience in sales.
• Strong leadership, clear communication, and solid negotiation skills.
• Experience managing key clients and driving revenue growth.
• Proven ability to work with targets and make decisions quickly.
• Proficiency using digital workspace tools.
• Strong understanding of sales strategies, market trends, and customer management.
• Experience handling digital campaigns and working with brand teams, advertisers, or media planners.
• Candidates from media companies score higher because the workflow, KPIs, and ecosystem match this role.
• Experience in  agencies, general sales, retail, activation agency, event organizer, or non digital fields is not relevant.

Role Expectations
• Lead and guide the sales team.
• Maintain high value clients and grow accounts.
• Manage programmatic and direct deals.
• Build long term relationships with advertisers.
• Understand ad inventory, pricing, performance metrics, and monetization strategies.
• Drive revenue based on media products and ad placements.

Job Description
Monitor data ingestion from multiple sources to ensure completeness & accuracy
Identify and log data-related issues, escalating critical issues to relevant teams when
necessary
Use monitoring dashboards or tools to track system performance and data health
Collaborate with technical teams to report and assist in resolving system or data flow
interruptions
Ensure scheduled updates for content across all monitored media types are accurate
and on time
Work closely with Product, Data, and Media Intelligence teams to ensure data
requirements are met
Provide periodic reports on data reliability, completeness, and quality to stakeholders

Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Statistics, Communications, or a related field.
Basic skills in Python and SQL/query writing.
Strong interest in news and media, both mainstream and social media platforms.
Understanding of social media username concepts and user behavior.
Basic understanding of media monitoring and news trend analysis.
Detail-oriented, analytical, and comfortable handling large datasets.
Able to work independently or collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
Experience in data collection and data cleaning; experience handling text-based data (news or social media) is a plus.
High attention to detail, strong problem-solving skills, and a strong willingness to be on standby when needed (mandatory).
Familiarity and knowledge of Api, Python, and data crawling/scraping are strong advantages.
Strong proficiency in Google Sheets, including formulas such as vlookup, regexmatch, and Remove Duplicates.

Job Description
Develop, Test, and Deploy iOS Applications: Design and implement high-quality iOS applications using Swift, ensuring seamless user experience and optimal performance.
Ensure Code Quality and Performance: Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code, adhering to best practices and coding standards.
Maintain and Update Existing Applications: Troubleshoot and resolve issues, optimize performance, and implement new features to enhance user experience.
Design and Implement Scalable Architecture: Develop modular and scalable designs using MVVM architecture, ensuring ease of maintenance and future enhancements.
Deploy Applications to App Store: Successfully deploy applications to the App Store, ensuring compliance with Apple's guidelines and regulations.
Ensure Application Security: Implement robust security measures, including code encryption, authentication, and data protection.
Minimum Qualifications
Proven Experience: At least 1 year of experience in developing and maintaining iOS applications.
Strong Problem-Solving Skills: Excellent debugging and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to resolve complex issues.
Effective Communication and Teamwork: Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
Ability to Work Under Pressure: Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines and work under pressure, while maintaining high-quality output.
Commitment to Continuous Learning: Passionate about staying up-to-date with the latest developments in iOS programming and best practices.
Programming Language: Proficiency in Swift 5.
Frameworks: Experience with UIKit, ProgramaticUI, or SwiftUI.
Architecture Patterns: Familiarity with MVVM architecture.
Version Control: Experience with GitLab.
APIs and Networking: Knowledge of Alamofire and networking principles.
Database: Experience with UserDefaults, CoreData, and Combine.
Third-Party SDK Integration: Proven experience in integrating third-party SDKs.
Possessing experience in developing Android applications using Kotlin will be regarded as an added advantage.

Job Description
Develop and enhance source code to support DAM application requirements.
Perform fixing and troubleshooting of the DAM application.
Support in building user-friendly interfaces and ensuring application responsiveness.
Help troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing systems.
Collaborate with senior developers and business teams to gather and understand user requirements.
Support system integration and ensure data consistency across modules.
Maintain basic technical documentation for projects.
Participate in regular team meetings and contribute to project updates.
Minimum Qualifications
A bachelor degree in technical majors is preferred (e.g. Computer Science, Information Technology)
Passion in software engineering and big data systems
Proficient in PHP, JavaScript, and Python (as an additional skill).
Strong understanding of modular concepts.
Experienced in web development frameworks such as CodeIgniter and Laravel (with additional advantages in Next.js, Vue, and Django).
Skilled in utilizing Docker as a development environment.
Proficient in using version control systems (Git).
Capable of leveraging AI tools to support tasks and develop automation.
Able to work effectively in a team and communicate clearly.
